riddles.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
hints: You might hear me in caves or canyons

riddles.question: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
hints: Everyone leaves these when they move
You can see them in sand or snow

riddles.question: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?
hints: I'm a representation, not the real thing
I can fit in your pocket but show the whole world

riddles.question: What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a head but never weeps, has a bed but never sleeps?
hints: I move constantly in one direction

riddles.question: I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
Forward I am heavy, but backward I am not. What am I?
